column1: Kata Robata////As for the food on the regular menu
column2: I got some special sashimi pieces (pics below)
column4: and black cod. My fave of these items was the black cod. The texture and flavor were unforgettable. It was unexpectedly sweet
column5: which was really good with a hint of lemon juice. I am drooling just thinking about it! Lobster Mac and cheese was good but it wasn't mesmerizing. This was my second time eating it
column6: and both times I wasn't impressed.
